content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal experience or opinions, however, here are some recommendations based on reviews from customers:

1. The Old Cinema: This vintage emporium located on King Street offers unique and one-of-a-kind antique pieces ranging from furniture to clothing and accessories.

2. The Ravenscourt Apothecary: This boutique offers natural and handmade skincare and wellness products, including essential oils, herbal remedies, and beauty products.

3. The Handmade Cake Company: This bakery specializes in handcrafted cakes, cupcakes, and pastries made with locally sourced ingredients.

4. Cocoba Chocolate: This chocolate shop offers premium, artisanal chocolate treats, including truffles, bars, and hot chocolate mix.

5. Lulu & Fred: This boutique offers a handpicked selection of clothing, accessories, and homeware from independent designers and brands. They also host pop-up events and workshops.
